sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, TextField, Typography, Link, Paper } from '@mui/material';

function LoginPage() {
  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        minHeight: "100vh",
        bgcolor: "#fff",
        display: "flex",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center"
      }}
    >
      <Paper sx={{ p: 4, maxWidth: 360, width: "100%", boxShadow: 3, borderRadius: 3 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 700, color: "#E23744", mb: 2, textAlign: "center" }}>
          Login
        </Typography>
        <TextField
          label="Email or Phone"
          variant="outlined"
          fullWidth
          sx={{ mb: 2 }}
        />
        <TextField
          label="Password"
          variant="outlined"
          type="password"
          fullWidth
          sx={{ mb: 2 }}
        />
        <Button
          fullWidth
          variant="contained"
          sx={{
            bgcolor: "#E23744",
            color: "#fff",
            borderRadius: 2,
            py: 1.3,
            fontWeight: 700,
            fontSize: "1rem",
            '&:hover': { bgcolor: "#b81a34" }
          }}
        >
          LOGIN
        </Button>
        <Box sx={{ mt: 2, textAlign: "center" }}>
          <Link href="#" underline="hover" sx={{ color: "#E23744" }}>
            Forgot password?
          </Link>
          <Typography sx={{ mt: 1 }} variant="caption">
            Donâ€™t have an account?{" "}
            <Link href="/signup" underline="hover" sx={{ color: "#E23744" }}>
              Sign Up
            </Link>
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Paper>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default LoginPage;
